T

TAG_COLLISION - Static variable in class marlin.auber.components.AABB
This AABB should be used for precise collision.
TAG_COLLISION_X_ONLY - Static variable in class marlin.auber.components.AABB
This AABB should be used for collision on the X axis - in other words, the collision system will test the bottom-left and bottom-right corners of the AABB for collision.
TAG_RENDER - Static variable in class marlin.auber.components.AABB
This AABB should be used to determine the rendered size of an object.
